line_1: Now scorch'd by June, now in November steep'd,
line_2: Of Feature stern, Selvaggio well yclep'd,

line_1: Now scorch'd by June, now in November steep'd,
line_2: But wondrous poor: he neither sow'd nor reap'd,

line_1: Now scorch'd by June, now in November steep'd,
line_2: Ne Stores in Summer for cold Winter heap'd;
